title: Can't stop touching your face? Here's how to break a bad habit - The Globe and Mail
description: Disruptions like the current coronavirus crisis actually present an opportunity to break old habits and form better, healthier ones
content:
Public health experts are urging people to stop touching their face to reduce the transmission of the novel coronavirus.
MadRolly/iStockPhoto / Getty Images
